title: Mikaela Shiffrin
summary: Mikaela Pauline Shiffrin (born March 13, 1995) is an American two-time Olympic Gold Medalist and World Cup alpine skier. She is a three-time Overall World Cup champion, a four-time world champion in slalom, and a six-time winner of the World Cup discipline title in that event.[3][4] Shiffrin is the youngest slalom champion in Olympic alpine skiing history, at 18 years and 345 days.[5][6][7][8]
